page.title: 07CROWCOMBE YOUTH HOSTEL
page.content: Membership costs are:5-15 Â£1,16-20 Â£3.21, over 20 Â£5,Familys Â£10 and life Â£50.Over-night costs are:5-15 Â£2,16-20 Â£2.35 and 21 and over Â£3.05. Meal costs are:Breakfast Â£1.40, Evening meal Â£1.80 and packed lunches are 95p.Times are:Getting up- 7.45, Breakfast- 8.15,you have to be out by 10.00 and you can come back in at 5.00.The wardens are MR and MRS BEAKE. They own 4 acres of ground.It is a standard youth hostel.There is a member's kitchen where you can make your own meals.The rooms are:the bathroom,common room,shop,field study room and big and small dining rooms. There are 56 beds.There is a gong to wake you up in the morning. Walkers come from Holford and go on to Minehead.Cyclists come from Exford and go on to Street or Cheddar.You have to do chores before you can go out.
